sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro (D), who will face a Republican opponent in the gubernatorial election in November, is currently running an ad to boost GOP primary candidate Doug Mastriano based on the perception that he would be the easiest to defeat, the New York Times reports.
author: John Binder
title: NY Times: Democrat Runs Ad Intended to Help Doug Mastriano Win Pennsylvania GOP Gubernatorial Primary

sentence: Politico: Dem-allied groups drop an A-bomb on state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) to start Pennsylvania governors race.
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hills Morning Report  Biden: US economy has problems; vows Taiwan defense
